content: cast on 2 sts work in garter knit every row for 7 row on the next row you will turn this tab and pick up stitches on the bumps along the edge row 1 k2 yo turn work 90 degrees pick up 1 stitch yo repeat twice more turn 90 deg pick up and knit 2 co sts 11 sts row 2 ws k2 pm yo p7 yo pm k2 13sts row 3 rs k2 sm kyok k to 1 st before marker kyok sm k2 row 4 ws k2 sm yo p to marker yo sm k2 serenity by rachel booker 2 ©featherbrush designs 2015 all rights reserved the pattern row 1-8 work stocking stitch 4 times row 9-12 work garter band twice row 13-20 work body lace panel row 21-22 work garter band once repeat these row 5 times or until you no longer have enough yarn remaining for a full repeat work garter band twice more and continue to bind off alternatively on your final repeat work the body lace panel through to row 6 then work the extended lace see page 4 until you have just enough yarn remaining to bind off the stitches stocking stitch garter band row 1 rs k2 sm kyok k to 1 stitch before row 1 rs k2 sm kyok k to 1 stitch before marker kyok sm k2 marker kyok sm k2 row 2 ws k2 sm yo p to marker yo sm k2 row 2 ws k2 sm yo k to marker yo sm k2 body lace panel work row 1-8 of chart or as written row 1 rs k2 sm kyok k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk repeat until 5 sts remain before marker k1 k2tog yo k1 kyok sm k2 row 2 ws k2 sm yo p to marker yo sm k2 row 3 rs k2 sm kyok k2tog yo k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 yo repeat until 9 sts remain before marker sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 yo ssk kyok sm k2 row 4 ws k2 sm yo p to marker yo sm k2 row 5 rs k2 sm kyok k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo repeat until 5 sts remain before marker k1 yo ssk k1 kyok sm k2 row 6 ws k2 sm yo p to marker yo sm k2 row 7 rs k2 sm kyok k2 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k1 repeat until 2 sts remain before marker k1 kyok sm k2 row 8 ws k2 sm yo k to marker yo sm k2 bind off bind off using your preferred stretchy bind off jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off is a good option whatever you use it must be stretchy enough to block out the lace go up a needle size if you find your bobble is too tight serenity by rachel booker 3 ©featherbrush designs 2015 all rights reserved finishing sew ends and wet block soak your shawl in a gentle wool
